name: Crystal Steelix

passive.name: Crystal Shell
passive.effect: When Crystal Steelix is Knocked Out, you may discard Crystal Steelix and remove all damage counters and status effects from the Basic Pokemon. Crystal Steelix is still knocked out.

attacks.name: Cold Revenge
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage for each damage counter on Crystal Steelix.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.effect: You may generate 3 Ice Energy and shuffle them into your opponent's deck.

flavor: Their shells are touch to penetrate. While they can't dish out a lot of damage, they're incredibly tough, even under the outer layer of crystal.
